roomsdescription: Explore our comfortable rooms and wards designed for your comfort and recovery.
nwingdescription: The North Wing was opened in 1974, containing six en-suite rooms and a dedicated nursing team. Due to its first-class facilities and five-star accommodation, the North Wing was aptly dubbed “The Hilton on the Hill”. In 2012, the Board of Management initiated the redevelopment of the North Wing to meet the high-end care sought by our clients. It now has 12 suites, developed to the highest international standards with the goal to exceed the guests’ expectations.
nwinglist1: ICU-ready rooms for immediate medical care
nwinglist3: Extensive gourmet menu tailored to dietary needs
nwinglist5: Wall-mounted HD TV with cable connection
nwinglist6: Marble bathroom with euro-style walk-in shower
nwinglist8: High-speed internet and direct telephone services
nwinglist11: Egyptian cotton bed linens for ultimate comfort
swingdescription: The South Wing is made up of 36 luxurious self-contained rooms in the St. Francis, St. Teresa and St. John’s wards.
swinglist1: Extensive menu with a variety of options
swinglist3: Wall-mounted HD TV with cable connection
swinglist4: Bathroom with bathtub and shower facilities
ensuitdescription: Stay in a self-contained private room with a Wall-mounted HD TV and cable connection.
privateroomsdescription: Patients may choose to stay in a private room with access to a shared washroom facility.
wardbeddescription: Our wards can accommodate up to eight patients with access to shared washroom facilities.
